document_data.name: Nako Nang
document_data.mainbody: '''Nako Nang''' was a [[wu jen]] [[adventurer]] and merchant in [[Tabot]] ''circa'' {{YearlinkConvert|2607|SY}}.
document_data.Activities:
Nako had a small house in the town of [[Talung]] but was most often out with his caravans. A servant minded the house while he was away, and was well-paid and happy.

He traded furs and ice in exchange for timber and [[steel]], and sometimes new [[spell]]s. Loving life on the caravans, he had journeyed all over Tabot and much of [[T'u Lung]]. Nako was an able guide and a true adventurer, telling many stories of the legends of Tabot and his own deeds. He respected Tabot's High Lord of Oceans and the theocratic government.
